1. Etnis rohingya dan orang palestina sama-sama beragama islam.
2. Etnis rohingya dan orang palestina sama-sama terancam di negaranya sendiri.
3. Etnis rohingya dan orang palestina sama-sama hanya ingin bebas dari malapetaka yang disebabkan oleh konflik/peperangan.

1. Rohingya ethnic and Palestinians are both Muslim.
2. Rohingya ethnic and Palestinians are both threatened in their own country.
3. The Rohingya ethnic and Palestinians both just want to be free from disaster caused by conflict/war.

Based on the information above, I became more confused why there could be two different types of treatments under the same conditions.
